sentences.en: ...a rendering of Verdi's Requiem by the Chicago Symphony Orchestra.
sentences.cn: ...芝加哥交响乐团对威尔第的《安魂曲》的一场演奏。

sentences.en: Browser: Downloading & rendering of page content runs promptly.
sentences.cn: 浏览器: 下载 和 渲染页面内容运行得更加顺畅.

sentences.en: Functions: rendering the original function, Lagrange interpolation, cubic spline interpolation function.
sentences.cn: 功能: 绘制原函数 、 Lagrange插值 、 三次样条插值函数.

sentences.en: Geometry processing, deformation etc. in advance of rendering on RSX.
sentences.cn: 几何运算 、 变形等等这些部分则会利用到RSX的渲染优势.

sentences.en: Have you heard his rendering of Beethoven?
sentences.cn: 你听过他演奏的贝多芬的曲子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her rendering of it fell somewhere between that of teacher and supplicant.
sentences.cn: 她表达这首诗的方式是介乎教学和祈求之间.

sentences.en: His narrative is a super rendering of dialect speech and idiom.
sentences.cn: 他的叙述是方言和土语最成功的运用.

sentences.en: Inline rendering does bring view code into the controller.
sentences.cn: 内联渲染在控制器内生成视图代码.

sentences.en: It is a collection of the most exquisite rendering of ancient Chinese verse.
sentences.cn: 这里面汇集了中国古诗文的翻译精品.

sentences.en: Let us enter the Halls of the Pyramid of Mythological Rendering.
sentences.cn: 让我们进入神话描写的金字塔大厅里.

sentences.en: Rendering poetry into other languages is difficult.
See here for more information about optimizing rendering performance.
sentences.cn: 看这里获得更多的渲染性能优化的信息.

sentences.en: She gave a splendid rendering of Beethoven's piano sonata.
sentences.cn: 她精彩地演奏了贝多芬的钢琴奏鸣曲.

sentences.en: Some agencies, however, have developed elaborate informal processes for rendering advisory opinions.
sentences.cn: 可是, 有些行政机关发展了详尽的提供咨询意见的非正式程序.

sentences.en: The translator has done a good job of rendering this difficult poem into his native language.
sentences.cn: 把这首非常难懂的诗歌译成本国语言,译者做了一件大好事.

sentences.en: The wind inopportunely freshened , rendering the drift of the light craft much more rapid.
sentences.cn: 偏偏风力又增强了,这只轻舟以更大的速度向前漂去.

words.tran_cn: 致使；提出；实施；着色；以…回报
翻译；表现；表演；描写；打底；（建筑物等）透视图

phrases.tran_cn: 显色性；演色性；色彩再现，色彩转换，打底色彩

trans.tran_cn: 翻译，表演，（墙壁的）初涂，打底，（建筑物等）透视图
trans.tran_en: someone’s performance of a play, piece of music etc
